column2: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
column7: This quote belongs to Mahatma Gandhi.

column2: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
column7: This quote belongs to Franklin D. Roosevelt.

column2: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
column7: This quote belongs to Albert Einstein.

column2: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
column7: This quote belongs to Ralph Waldo Emerson.

column2: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
column7: This quote belongs to Lao Tzu.

column2: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
column7: This quote belongs to Nelson Mandela.

column2: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
column7: This quote belongs to Friedrich Nietzsche.

column2: What we think, we become.
column7: This quote belongs to Buddha.

column2: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
column7: This quote belongs to Japanese Proverb.

column2: Well done is better than well said.
column7: This quote belongs to Benjamin Franklin.

column2: An unexamined life is not worth living.
column7: This quote belongs to Socrates.

column2: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
column7: This quote belongs to John Lennon.

column2: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
column7: This quote belongs to Winston Churchill.

column2: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
column7: This quote belongs to Aristotle.

column2: I think, therefore I am.
column7: This quote belongs to René Descartes.

column2: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
column7: This quote belongs to Socrates.

column2: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
column7: This quote belongs to Friedrich Nietzsche.

column2: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
column7: This quote belongs to Peter Drucker.

column2: Knowledge is power.
column7: This quote belongs to Francis Bacon.

column2: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
column7: This quote belongs to Albert Einstein.

column2: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.
column7: This quote belongs to Dr. Seuss.

column2: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
column7: This quote belongs to William James.

column2: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
column7: This quote belongs to Wayne Gretzky.

column2: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
column7: This quote belongs to Ralph Waldo Emerson.

column2: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go together.
column7: This quote belongs to African Proverb.

column2: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
column7: This quote belongs to Confucius.

column2: Dream big and dare to fail.
column7: This quote belongs to Norman Vaughan.

column2: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
column7: This quote belongs to Albert Einstein.

column2: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
column7: This quote belongs to Oprah Winfrey.

column2: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
column7: This quote belongs to Theodore Roosevelt.

column2: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
column7: This quote belongs to Oscar Wilde.

column2: Peace begins with a smile.
column7: This quote belongs to Mother Teresa.

column2: The best revenge is massive success.
column7: This quote belongs to Frank Sinatra.

column2: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
column7: This quote belongs to Milton Berle.

column2: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
column7: This quote belongs to Suzy Kassem.

column2: A journey is best measured in friends, not in miles.
column7: This quote belongs to Tim Cahill.

column2: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
column7: This quote belongs to Napoleon Hill.

column2: Fortune favors the bold.
column7: This quote belongs to Latin Proverb.

column2: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
column7: This quote belongs to Aristotle.

column2: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
column7: This quote belongs to Aristotle.

column2: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
column7: This quote belongs to Anaïs Nin.

column2: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
column7: This quote belongs to Henry David Thoreau.

column2: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
column7: This quote belongs to Franklin D. Roosevelt.

column2: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
column7: This quote belongs to George Addair.

column2: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
column7: This quote belongs to Confucius.

column2: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
column7: This quote belongs to Sam Levenson.

column2: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
column7: This quote belongs to Frank Ocean.

column2: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
column7: This quote belongs to Steve Jobs.

column2: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
column7: This quote belongs to Mark Twain.

column2: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
column7: This quote belongs to George S. Patton.

column2: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
column7: This quote belongs to Confucius.

column2: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
column7: This quote belongs to Thomas Jefferson.

column2: Do one thing every day that scares you.

column2: Don’t gain the world and lose your soul.

column2: All limitations are self-imposed.

column2: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

column2: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.

column2: No pressure, no diamonds.

column2: Hustle beats talent when talent doesn’t hustle.

column2: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.

column2: Do small things with great love.

column2: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear – not absence of fear.

column2: Fall in love with the process and the results will come.

column2: Don’t limit your challenges, challenge your limits.
column7: This quote belongs to Anonymous.

column2: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
column7: This quote belongs to Jean-Jacques Rousseau.

column2: Little by little, one travels far.
column7: This quote belongs to J.R.R. Tolkien.

column2: Failure is another stepping stone to greatness.
column7: This quote belongs to Oprah Winfrey.

column2: No rain, no flowers.
column7: This quote belongs to Proverb.

column2: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
column7: This quote belongs to Mahatma Gandhi.

column2: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
column7: This quote belongs to Benjamin Franklin.

column2: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
column7: This quote belongs to Winston Churchill.

column2: Effort never betrays you.
column7: This quote belongs to Japanese Proverb.

column2: Stay away from those who try to belittle your ambitions.
column7: This quote belongs to Mark Twain.

column2: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
column7: This quote belongs to Franklin D. Roosevelt.

column2: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
column7: This quote belongs to Winston Churchill.

column2: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
column7: This quote belongs to Babe Ruth.

column2: You don’t find the happy life, you make it.
column7: This quote belongs to Camilla Eyring Kimball.

column2: Never regret anything that made you smile.
column7: This quote belongs to Mark Twain.

column2: Your only limit is your mind.
column7: This quote belongs to Anonymous.

column2: The harder you work, the luckier you get.
column7: This quote belongs to Gary Player.

column2: Old ways won’t open new doors.

column2: Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
column7: This quote belongs to Vince Lombardi.

column2: Big journeys begin with small steps.
column7: This quote belongs to Chinese Proverb.

column2: A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they recover when they fall.
column7: This quote belongs to Serena Williams.

column2: Nothing will work unless you do.
column7: This quote belongs to Maya Angelou.

column2: Life is short, and it is here to be lived.
column7: This quote belongs to Kate Winslet.

column2: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
column7: This quote belongs to C.S. Lewis.

column2: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
column7: This quote belongs to Tim Notke.

column2: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
column7: This quote belongs to Dalai Lama.

column2: Without rain, nothing grows. Learn to embrace the storms.
column7: This quote belongs to Anonymous.

column2: You can if you think you can.
column7: This quote belongs to George Reeves.

column2: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
column7: This quote belongs to Walt Disney.

column2: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
column7: This quote belongs to Dalai Lama.

column2: Dream as if you'll live forever, live as if you'll die today.

column2: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
column7: This quote belongs to Jim Rohn.

column2: If not now, when?
column7: This quote belongs to Hillel the Elder.

column2: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
column7: This quote belongs to Matt Cameron.

column2: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.

column2: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

column2: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.
